tours.name: City Explorer Tour
tours.description:
Experience the best of six iconic cities in this unforgettable 3-day adventure. From the romantic streets of Paris to the bustling markets of Bangkok, immerse yourself in the diverse cultures and breathtaking landmarks of each destination.

Day 1: Paris
Begin your journey in the City of Lights, Paris. Marvel at the timeless beauty of the Eiffel Tower as you enjoy a scenic boat cruise along the Seine River. Stroll through the charming Montmartre district and visit the iconic Notre-Dame Cathedral.

Day 2: Singapore & Roma
Next stop, the vibrant city-state of Singapore. Explore the futuristic Gardens by the Bay and indulge in a culinary adventure at a local hawker center. Then, transport yourself to ancient Rome as you step into the legendary Colosseum and wander through the historic streets of the Roman Forum.

Day 3: Bangkok, Bali & Phuket
In Bangkok, Thailand's bustling capital, visit the majestic Grand Palace and reclining Buddha at Wat Pho. Then, escape to the tropical paradise of Bali, where you'll discover pristine beaches and lush rice terraces. Finally, conclude your journey in Phuket, Thailand's largest island. Cruise through the picturesque Phi Phi archipelago, snorkel in crystal-clear waters, and relax on the famous Maya Bay, featured in the movie 'The Beach'.

This all-inclusive tour includes comfortable accommodations, guided tours in English and Spanish, delicious local meals, entrance fees to attractions, and convenient hotel pickups and drop-offs. Join us for an unforgettable exploration of these incredible cities!
listing: Marvel at the Eiffel Tower in Paris
Cruise along the Seine River
Explore Montmartre and Notre-Dame Cathedral
Visit the futuristic Gardens by the Bay in Singapore
Experience the Colosseum and Roman Forum in Rome
Discover the Grand Palace and Wat Pho in Bangkok
Relax on the beaches of Bali
Snorkel at Maya Bay in Phuket
whatsIncluded: Guided tours in English and Spanish
itinerary: Day 1: Paris - Marvel at the Eiffel Tower. Cruise along the Seine River. Explore Montmartre and Notre-Dame Cathedral.
Day 2: Singapore & Roma - Visit the futuristic Gardens by the Bay in Singapore. Experience the Colosseum and Roman Forum in Rome.
Day 3: Bangkok, Bali & Phuket - Discover the Grand Palace and Wat Pho in Bangkok. Relax on the beaches of Bali. Snorkel at Maya Bay in Phuket.
